vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐμπορ-εύομαι,
future -πορεύσομαι: aorist 1 ἐνεπορεύθην:—middle, aorist 1 -ευσάμην[Refs 5th c.BC+]:—travel, ξένην ἔπι.. γαῖαν [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ποῖ δ᾽ ἐμπορεύ; [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 absolutely, walk, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II travel for traffic or business, Χρηματισμοῦ Χάριν [Refs 5th c.BC+]; εἰς Πόντον Chion [Refs] inveigh against the art of healing, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.2 to be a merchant, traffic, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: with accusative, trade in, γῆν [LXX]
__II.3 with accusative of things, import, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; πολλὰς διὰ θαλάσσης ὠφελείας [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__II.3.b metaphorically, δίαιταν ἥντιν᾽ ἐμπορεύεται what manner of lite he leads, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἐ. τὴν φιλοσοφίαν to make a trade of it, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; in bad sense, trade on, τὴν λήθην τῶν δικαστῶν [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II.4 with accusative person, make gain of, overreach, cheat, πλαστοῖς λόγοις ὑμᾶς [NT]:—also in active, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 在, 裡, 藉著, 靠 ...
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 在, 里, 借着, 靠 ...

vocabInfos.shortDef: to carry on business; exploit traffic
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to carry on business; exploit traffic
to travel; to travel for business' sake; to trade, traffic, Jas. 4:13; by implication, transitive, to make a gain of, deceive for one's own advantage, exploit 2Pet. 2:3*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 作買賣 (雅 4:13)
2) 買賣, 交易 (彼後 2:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 作买卖 (雅 4:13)
2) 买卖, 交易 (彼后 2:3)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đi kinh doanh; buôn bán. ἐν (G1722) + πορεύω (G4198)
